OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupArsMagica2
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Ars Magica 2 Ores.

OptionChoice.name: enableArsMagica2
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation handle Ars Magica 2 ore generation?

Choice.description: Use Custom Ore Generation to handle Ars Magica 2 ores.
Ars Magica 2 ores will be handled by the mod itself.

OptionChoice.name: cleanUpArsMagica2
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation use the Substitution Pass to remove all instances of Ars Magica 2 ore from the world? If the mod's oregen can be turned off in its configuration, then it's recommended to do so, as the substitution pass can slow the game significantly. If this option is disabled without disabling the mod's own ore generation, you'll end up with two oregens working at once, flooding the world with ore. Enabled by default to ensure the ores are completely removed.

Choice.description: Use the substitution pass to clean up Ars Magica 2 ores.
Ars Magica 2 ores do not need to be cleaned up by a substitution pass.

Choice.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Vinteum is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: arsmVinteumFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Vinteum distributions

OptionNumeric.name: arsmVinteumSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Vinteum distributions

OptionChoice.name: arsmMountainVinteumDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Mountain Vinteum is generated

Choice.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Mountain Vinteum is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: arsmMountainVinteumFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Mountain Vinteum distributions

OptionNumeric.name: arsmMountainVinteumSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Mountain Vinteum distributions

Choice.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Chimerite is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Chimerite distributions

OptionNumeric.name: arsmChimeriteSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Chimerite distributions

OptionChoice.name: arsmMountainChimeriteDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Mountain Chimerite is generated

Choice.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Mountain Chimerite is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: arsmMountainChimeriteFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Mountain Chimerite distributions

OptionNumeric.name: arsmMountainChimeriteSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Mountain Chimerite distributions

OptionChoice.name: arsmBlueTopazDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Blue Topaz is generated

Choice.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Blue Topaz is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: arsmBlueTopazFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Blue Topaz distributions

OptionNumeric.name: arsmBlueTopazSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Blue Topaz distributions

OptionChoice.name: arsmMountainBlueTopazDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Mountain Blue Topaz is generated

Choice.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Mountain Blue Topaz is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: arsmMountainBlueTopazFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Mountain Blue Topaz distributions
OptionNumeric.DisplayName: Ars Magica 2 Mountain Blue Topaz Freq.

OptionNumeric.name: arsmMountainBlueTopazSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Mountain Blue Topaz distributions
OptionNumeric.DisplayName: Ars Magica 2 Mountain Blue Topaz Size

Substitute.name: arsmOverworldBlockSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Veins.name: arsmVinteumVeins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining.

Cloud.name: arsmVinteumCloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi- permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: arsmVinteumHintVeins
Veins.Description: Single blocks, generously scattered through all heights (density is about that of vanilla iron ore). They will replace dirt and sandstone (but not grass or sand), so they can be found nearer to the surface than most ores. Intened to be used as a child distribution for large, rare strategic deposits that would otherwise be very difficult to find. Note that the frequency is multiplied by ground level to maintain a constant density, but not by ore frequency because it is assumed that the frequency of the parent distribution will already be scaled by that.

StandardGen.name: arsmVinteumStandard
StandardGen.Description: A master preset for standardgen ore distributions.
